content:
Antonio Caliò is a PhD student in the field of Data Science, with a particular emphasis on Social Network Analysis.
During his PhD, he developed deep knowledge on a number of relevant problems in the on many relevant problems belonging to the Network Science domain.
More specifically, he studied problems related to diffusion models, influence propagation/maximization and graph decomposition algorithms.
